mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.transport_scope_code AS "transportScopeCode", a.transport_obj_code AS "transportObjCode", a.transport_scope_type AS "transportScopeType", a.max_load_weight AS "maxLoadWeight", a.max_load_cubic AS "maxLoadCubic", a.max_amount AS "maxAmount", a.data_set AS "dataSet", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", scds.name AS "dataSetName", a.transport_scope_code AS "oldTransportScopeCode", a.transport_obj_code AS "oldTransportObjCode", a.transport_scope_type AS "oldTransportScopeType"
LEFT JOIN sys_common_data_set scds ON a.data_set = scds.code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_tms_transport_obj_scope( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, transport_scope_code, transport_obj_code, transport_scope_type, max_load_weight, max_load_cubic, max_amount, data_set, rec_ver ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{transportScopeCode}, #{transportObjCode}, #{transportScopeType}, #{maxLoadWeight}, #{maxLoadCubic}, #{maxAmount}, #{dataSet}, #{recVer} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_tms_transport_obj_scope SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, del_flag = #{delFlag}, remarks = #{remarks}, transport_scope_code = #{transportScopeCode}, transport_obj_code = #{transportObjCode}, transport_scope_type = #{transportScopeType}, max_load_weight = #{maxLoadWeight}, max_load_cubic = #{maxLoadCubic}, max_amount = #{maxAmount}, data_set = #{dataSet}, rec_ver = rec_ver + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
